for the physxcudart_20.dll missing issue, just do this: 
go to your game's "Binaries" folder, in there you''ll find a cudart.dll file. Copy & paste it. Now, you'll have 2 cudart.dll files on the same folder. Just rename the second one to physxcudart_20.dll, and you're good to go.
